_header: Of tales and trifles many men tells
_description: The Tale of the Basin — twenty-five stanzas, generally 9-line (aaaabcccb); 223 lines altogether

CULFf548.First Lines:
Off talys and trifulles many men tellysSumme byn trew and sum byn
                    ellis…
CULFf548.Last Lines: …Mary for hir ioyes fyfeShelde vs alle fro care
